item.title: NCLH
item.description: score:169 Chances: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. has shown rising price performance, earning an upgrade to its IBD Relative Strength Rating. Oceania Cruises, a brand under NCLH, has announced the appointment of its two executive culinary directors, indicating a focus on enhancing customer experience and quality.
